<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get list of financial transactions regarding an account"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/account/movement"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

This method returns all the financial transactions of an account with pagination.

</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"accountId","description":"Account Unique Identificator","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","required":true},{"name":"startDate","description":"Start date for the search","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","required":true},{"name":"endDate","description":"Max date for the search","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","required":true},{"name":"pageNumber","description":"Start page number","schema":{"type":"integer"},"in":"query","required":true},{"name":"perPage","description":"Number of items per page","schema":{"type":"integer"},"in":"query","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
